mapper.sql: a.id, a.in_date, b.goods_code, b.goods_name, a.product_date, a.expiring_date, a.cost_price, a.market_price, a.in_count
mapper.select: SELECT FROM device_road a LEFT JOIN goods_sku b ON a.goods_sku_id=b.id INNER JOIN device c ON c.id=a.device_id WHERE a.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device_road ( id, device_id, ctn, path_code, floor, goods_sku_id, sale_price, capacity, stock, warning_num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES ( #{id}, #{deviceId}, #{ctn}, #{pathCode}, #{floor}, #{goodsSkuId}, #{salePrice}, #{capacity}, #{stock}, #{warningNum}, #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy}, now() )
